item.title: Doks 1.3
item.description: Doks 1.3 — our first release of the new year — is here! This release includes restructured dependencies, deduplicated Bootstrap variables, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.2
item.description: Diagrams support, extended code blocks formatting, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.0
item.description: Doks 1.0 is a restructure release, making Doks more robust, reliable, and flexible.
